aboutpara: I am a driven, detail-oriented, creative problem solver who enjoys building full-stack applications that integrate seamlessly with third party APIâ€™s, and I have a love for test-driven development and quality documentation.

resume.tagline: Detail-oriented Software Engineer with excellent communication skills

bullets: Wrote scripts using Python JSON and Regex to extract data from government and corporate documents
Conducted quality analysis using internal document integration tool to ensure results met requirements outlined by specifications
Collaborated across teams to provide feedback on existing tools, report bugs and identify inefficiencies, Designed new features such as ability to add multi-language relationships between documents
Updated the primary documentation for the company's web crawler engine as well as onboarding materials for new hires, Delivered to key international stakeholders with tight turnaround and efficiency

experiences.position: Junior Software Engineer at Insight Orchards
bullets: Developed a core library of reusable UI components in React using Storybook to standardize development, testing, documentation, and reduce front-end inconsistencies
Collaborated in team meetings discussing feature requirements and implementation strategies, engaging in a range of solo, pairing, and mobbing sessions to optimize development solutions and workflow
Implemented payment gateway portal that supports a multi-tier subscription model and integrates with Stripe API
Built out full-stack calendar microservice consumed by both mobile and web clients, supporting CRUD operations for single and recurring events
Developed text and audio comment features end-to-end for a community-based media application
Leveraged Test-Driven Development to implement features via unit, integration, and end-to-end tests (Cypress, Jest)
Served as a liaison between design, product, and engineers, giving weekly demos, and integrating product feedback
Participated in agile rituals such as daily stand ups, code reviews, sprint plannings, and retrospectives
Provided IT support across five departments, including product development, product assembly, admin, shipping and technology
Analyzed business operations, identified inefficiencies across departments, and developed a company-wide inventory efficiency system to reduce waste and streamline orders
Conducted staff training for new enterprise technologies
Presented data indicating increased profit margins, streamlined production, improved inventory efficiency, staff confidence and productivity
Envisioned, developed and delivered four full stack web applications in three weeks
Adapted to rapid implementation of new technologies including third party API's, frameworks, libraries and databases
Trained in software development fundamentals, object-oriented programming, test driven development, Git/Github version control
Honed technical communications, delivered presentations highlighting project implementations details and business objectives
